name: Axpo Holding AG
goal:
Axpo Group reliably produces, trades and sells energy for over 3 million people and thousands of companies in Switzerland and over 30 European countries. About 4200 employees combine the expertise from 100 years of climate-friendly electricity production with innovative power for a sustainable energy future.
The Axpo Group comprises Axpo Holding AG with headquarters in Baden and its subsidiaries Axpo Power AG, Axpo Trading AG, Avectris AG and Centralschweizerischen Kraftwerke AG (CKW).
Axpo is wholly owned by the cantons of Northeastern Switzerland.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Single market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
- Clean Energy Package: all elements
- Upcoming Gas Package incl. Review of Gas Market Directive
- Review of Emission Trading System
- Linking of EU and Swiss Emission Trading Systems
- Implementation of MiFID II
- Review of EMIR (EMIR II)
- Commission Strategy on Corporate Social Responsibility (post 2014)
- Nuclear Illustrative Programme (PINC)
